title: T206 Near set for sale to collectors individually - Mostly PSA with some SGC
author: crispycards

posts.post_title: T206 Near set for sale to collectors individually - Mostly PSA with some SGC
posts.post_content:
Hi all - 
I am starting the process of breaking up a t206 set.  Most of these cards are commons or minor HOF and they mostly all have great visual appeal.  Most, if not all, are full sized, and many are oversized as well, as I have been very conscientious about adding cards to this set that I felt were unequivocally original. 
Pricing = not cheap, but still reasonable in most cases, especially considering the fact that so many T206 are setting records daily, and there is no Buyer's Premium.  I have picked the Jimmy Sheckard (no glove) and Spike Shannon cards as examples:  

Shannon PSA 5 w/Sweet Cap 350 30/24 $325
Sheckard PSA 3 w/Sweet Cap 150 Fac. 649 with Overstrike $175

A total of around 350 cards are available.  I'm hoping to find other collectors that want and need these cards for their sets, and NOT that guy that is going to ask me about 80 cards to just find that one that I have undervalued so that he can make $50 on his flip.  If that part describes you then please ignore this post.

Let me know what you need!
crispycards
Chris P
[url]chrisportersa@gmail.com[/url]
Email sent to you on Rossman in a PSA 5 or 4

Hey Mark W - 
Your email went to my SPAM and I accidentally nuked it.  Please re-send.
Thx
Chris
Text sent on 3 cards- Trent King

I'm sitting at about 35 responses so far, fortunately mostly for different cards. If you have reached out, please be patient - will get back with detailed responses as soon as I can.
Best 
Chris

Pm sent


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Hi all - 
Thanks again for your patience if I have not responded to you.  I am working diligently.  I unfortunately have deleted a couple more inquiries - one from a Mr. Helfridge and another from unknown.  If you sent me an email in the past hour or two and have NOT been replied to, please re-send the email.  My apologies for my old man lack of computer skills.
Chris

Chris,
I collect Cubs t206 cards. Currently I need several M. Brown, several F. Chance, J. Evers, J. Kling, O. Overall, J. Pfiester, E. Reulbach, F. Schultz, H. Steinfeldt, and J. Tinker. Wow, I know that is a broad group. Thank you! Jeff


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk

Hi Chris

Email sent. 

Thanks!

Scott

Shutting it down for the night.  We sure have a vibrant hobby as over 50 inquiries have arrived today.  If I didn't respond today I will tomorrow - thanks everyone!
Chris

OK - 
I think that I'm caught up with all respondents.  If you have reached out to me and NOT heard back please try again.  If you were waiting for the flood to drain to connect with me, then now is an OK time.  Many cards on offer and many sold but many still available.  Thanks to all for the great communications.
CP
